reporter_caption.center: EMIGRANT INDUSTRIAL SAVINGS BANK v. SONDERLICK, 267 App. Div. 764 (1943)

caption.center: EMIGRANT INDUSTRIAL SAVINGS BANK, Respondent, v. EMIL J. SONDERLICK,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion to dismiss appeals of defendant Sonderlick from two orders granted to the extent of dismissing the appeal from the order granting plaintiff's motion for summary judgment striking out his amended answer, with ten dollars costs, and appeal dismissed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Hagarty, Acting P.J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Lewis, JJ.
